thread.title: How A Blue Comet Influenced The Last Thirty Years Of Japanese Pop-Culture And Beyond
thread.title_full: How A Blue Comet Influenced The Last Thirty Years Of Japanese Pop-Culture And Beyond

author: Expert
title: How A Blue Comet Influenced The Last Thirty Years Of Japanese Pop-Culture And Beyond
text:
Topnews , US Expert 
Today is a very special day, as thirty years ago an anime series began airing on Japanese television. In the time since, it has gone on to influence all manner of anime and games both in Japan and abroad. The series in question is Blue Comet SPT Layzner.
